description.zh-cn: 中华民国海军中将，曾任国防部军事情报局局长，后因江南案被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A Vice Admiral of the Republic of China Navy and former Director of the Military Intelligence Bureau, Ministry of National Defense. He was later sentenced to life imprisonment for his involvement in the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的省会。
description.en: The capital city of Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 军衔等级。
description.en: A military rank.

description.zh-cn: 一国派驻于另一国的外交人员，负责军事合作与联系。
description.en: A diplomat sent by one country to another to handle military cooperation and liaison.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部底下的情报机关。
description.en: The intelligence agency under the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指美籍华裔作家刘宜良（笔名“江南”）在美国被刺杀的政治事件。
description.en: Refers to the political incident of the assassination of Chinese-American writer Henry Liu (pen name 'Jiang Nan') in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由意大利船厂制造的微型潜艇。
description.en: A class of midget submarines built by an Italian shipyard.

description.zh-cn: 美国建造的柴电潜舰。
description.en: A class of diesel-electric submarines built by the United States.

en: National Security Bureau of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统，为蒋中正之子。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President. He was the son of Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾为中华民国第一夫人，为蒋中正的妻子。
description.en: A political figure in the Republic of China who was the First Lady of the Republic of China, the wife of Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 军衔等级。
description.en: A military rank.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部军事情报局前副处长，江南案的核心人物之一。
description.en: Former deputy director of a department in the Military Intelligence Bureau of the Republic of China, a key figure in the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 台湾黑社会组织竹联帮前帮主，江南案的直接执行者。
description.en: Former leader of the Taiwanese triad Bamboo Union, the direct perpetrator of the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔作家，笔名“江南”，江南案的受害者。
description.en: A Chinese-American writer with the pen name 'Jiang Nan', the victim of the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 由陈虎门签呈，并由汪希苓批准的针对刘宜良的暗杀计划。
description.en: The assassination plan against Henry Liu, which was submitted by Chen Hu-men and approved by Wang Hsi-ling.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物，曾任国防部长。
description.en: A military figure of the Republic of China who served as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，曾任参谋总长、行政院院长。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China who served as Chief of the General Staff and Premier.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部军事情报局前副局长，因江南案被停职。
description.en: Former Deputy Director of the Military Intelligence Bureau of the Republic of China, suspended from duty due to the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 军衔等级。
description.en: A military rank.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军上将，曾任国家安全局局长，并在江南案后代理情报局局长。
description.en: A General of the Republic of China Army, former Director of the National Security Bureau, who served as acting Director of the Military Intelligence Bureau after the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 军衔等级。
description.en: A military rank.

description.zh-cn: 负责军事审判的司法机构。
description.en: A judicial body responsible for military trials.

description.zh-cn: 曾担任驻义大利副武官、驻美国副武官。
description.en: Served as Deputy Military Attaché in Italy and Deputy Military Attaché in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 1980年任国防部情报局少将副局长。
description.en: In 1980, he served as Deputy Director of the Intelligence Bureau of the Ministry of National Defense with the rank of Rear Admiral.

description.zh-cn: 以中将衔被停职。
description.en: Was suspended from duty with the rank of Vice Admiral.

position.zh-cn: 官邸上校海军武官侍卫官
position.en: Colonel Naval Attaché Guard at the official residence

description.zh-cn: 担任驻义大利副武官时，向义大利民间船厂订购两艘SX-404级微型潜艇，开启了中华民国潜舰国造。
description.en: While serving as Deputy Military Attaché in Italy, he ordered two SX-404 class midget submarines from an Italian civilian shipyard, initiating the ROC's indigenous submarine program.

description.zh-cn: 担任驻美国副武官时，游说美国国会与政府，成功争取美国向中华民国海军出售两艘海狮级潜艇。
description.en: While serving as Deputy Military Attaché in the United States, he lobbied the U.S. Congress and government, successfully securing the sale of two Hai Shih-class submarines to the ROC Navy.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋经国执政期间担任情报首长，并听从其指示。
description.en: Served as the intelligence chief during Chiang Ching-kuo's administration and followed his instructions.

description.zh-cn: 因江南案被捕，并被判处无期徒刑，后于1991年假释出狱。
description.en: Was arrested for his involvement in the Henry Liu case and sentenced to life imprisonment, and was later paroled in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国是宋美龄的继子，在与宋美龄的函电中自称“儿”。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo was Soong Mei-ling's stepson and referred to himself as 'son' in his correspondence with her.

description.zh-cn: 作为情报局副处长，向局长汪希苓提交“锄奸计划”签呈。
description.en: As the deputy director of a department in the Intelligence Bureau, he submitted the 'Eliminate Traitors Plan' to Director Wang Hsi-ling.

description.zh-cn: 胡仪敏时任情报局副局长，为局长汪希苓的副手。
description.en: Hu Yi-min served as the Deputy Director of the Intelligence Bureau, acting as the deputy to Director Wang Hsi-ling.

description.zh-cn: 接受汪希苓的命令，前往美国执行暗杀刘宜良的任务。
description.en: Accepted orders from Wang Hsi-ling to go to the United States to carry out the assassination of Henry Liu.

description.zh-cn: 批准了由陈虎门提交的“锄奸计划”。
description.en: Approved the 'Eliminate Traitors Plan' submitted by Chen Hu-men.

description.zh-cn: 该计划的执行直接导致了江南案的发生。
description.en: The execution of this plan directly led to the Henry Liu case.

description.zh-cn: 奉命暗杀了美籍作家刘宜良。
description.en: Assassinated the Chinese-American writer Henry Liu on orders.

description.zh-cn: 在江南案爆发后下令将汪希苓停职并交军法局严办。
description.en: After the Henry Liu case broke out, he ordered Wang Hsi-ling to be suspended and handed over to the military court for severe punishment.

description.zh-cn: 在江南案爆发后下令将胡仪敏停职。
description.en: After the Henry Liu case broke out, he ordered Hu Yi-min to be suspended.

description.zh-cn: 在江南案爆发后下令将陈虎门停职。
description.en: After the Henry Liu case broke out, he ordered Chen Hu-men to be suspended.

description.zh-cn: 在汪希苓被停职后，汪敬煦奉命兼代情报局局长职务。
description.en: After Wang Hsi-ling was suspended, Wang Ching-hsu was ordered to serve as the acting Director of the Intelligence Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 判处汪希苓无期徒刑。
description.en: Sentenced Wang Hsi-ling to life imprisonment.
